alert.note: Alert for Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 2:22AM CST until January 17 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, light mixed precipitation this morning. Additional light snow accumulations and ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Hamilton, Bradley, West Polk and East Polk Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even after snow and freezing drizzle have ended, icy hazardous travel is expected today and tonight, especially on untreated roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk
